meanings.sent1: The plant survives with regular watering and sunlight.
meanings.sent2: A seed survives by growing into a strong tree.
meanings.sent3: The little fish survives in the big pond by hiding among the rocks.
meanings.sent4: Hope survives even in the darkest of times.
meanings.sent5: Love survives all challenges and hardships.

meanings.definition: Remain alive after the death of someone.
meanings.sent1: The family survives the loss of their beloved pet by cherishing memories.
meanings.sent2: He survives his grandfather by carrying on his legacy.
meanings.sent3: The spirit of a loved one survives in the hearts of those who remember.
meanings.sent4: Her teachings survive through generations, inspiring many.
meanings.sent5: The impact of a kind act survives long after it is done.

meanings.sent1: Some ancient traditions survive modern times.
meanings.sent2: The old castle survives as a reminder of history.
meanings.sent3: The classic tale survives countless retellings with new twists.
meanings.sent4: His legacy survives through the stories told by the elders.
meanings.sent5: The wisdom of the past survives to guide us in the present.
